overview: Featuring a custom ambient score by talented ambient artist Frantz Amathy, "NATURE DREAMS" is a sweeping1 hour dynamic Nature Relaxationâ„¢ journey to some of the world's most majestic and colourful locations - and even those of our cosmos, thanks to video renderings from NASA's Hubble space telescope. On top of leaving the planet in a state of relaxation, you'll be transported from Canada to Hawaii; Mexico to Argentina; California to Oregon and many places in between.
title: Nature Dreams
